Title: Domestic Disturbance
Plot: Ruth returns from Thailand to a smart-arse encounter at the airport with Levi, who she doesn?t know. Her brother Daniel is deeply affected by a hit-and-run incident, on the anniversary of their father?s death. Isobel gently rejects Daniel?s attempt to inject ?spontaneity? into their relationship while Levi breaks into the flat and Neru struggles to deal with an oversized corpse.
